name: VZMacOSConfigurationRequirements
desc: An object that describes the parameter constraints required by a specific configuration of macOS.

items.name: var hardwareModel: VZMacHardwareModel
items.desc: The hardware model for this configuration.

items.name: var minimumSupportedCPUCount: Int
items.desc: The minimum supported number of CPUs for this configuration.

items.name: var minimumSupportedMemorySize: UInt64
items.desc: The minimum supported memory size for this configuration.
